divs: Sighting DetailsThis happened to my girlfriend and sister, one month ago. And now it happened to my girlfriend again tonight, 2 minutes before I arrived at her house. A Triangle with red lights on the corners, flying low, and moving back and forth and in weird motions, doing what would seem like impossible manuevers. Then it flew away over the houses and trees.
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Highlands Ranch
There was one other sighting in Highlands Ranch on or around September 5th 2005
